/.hero.title: Build, Create, and Support
/.hero.description: Explore Webflow templates, apps, apparel, and support options designed to keep projects, creativity, and code flowing. Whether you're launching a new site, maintaining a project, or just supporting Crystal’s journey, you’re helping push the web forward.

/category.page.title: Category
/category.page.empty.title: No products in {categoryName} yet
/category.page.empty.description: Check back soon, new items for {categoryName} are on the way.
/category.page.descriptions.webflow: Discover sleek, responsive Webflow templates and apps designed to help you launch faster with scalability and style. Each template is crafted to be flexible, user-friendly, and easy to customize, giving you the perfect foundation to build stunning websites and powerful digital experiences without limits.
/category.page.descriptions.apparel: Show off your dev style with Crystal's Store apparel. Eco-friendly hoodies and creative essentials made for everyday wear. Whether you're coding, designing, or building something amazing, stay comfortable, confident, and inspired wherever you work.
/category.page.descriptions.support: Support Crystal's work directly. Every contribution fuels new Webflow templates, apps, and opportunities for talented people and those who love to learn. Your backing helps unlock better tools, boost automation, advance AI innovation, and empower Crystal The Developer Inc. to become the best on the web. Let’s grow together. Thank you for your amazing support!
/category.page.descriptions.maintenance: Keep your website secure and running smoothly with flexible monthly or quarterly plans. All packages include support for Websites, CRM, and email automation tailored to fit your business needs. From a single update to unlimited updates, there is a plan for everyone.
